A figure offers a deal in the name of Clan Rowthron and invokes Temple of Pelagos as witness.
From cover, you notice a second party watching. Something feels staged.

choices.label: Set a simple trap/alarm and back off.

steps.text: They hesitate. A better offer is possible, but only if you pay in risk.
